message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Your offer was a bit unbalanced. Let's try something more even. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split still feels too uneven.  Let's aim for a 52/48 split in my favor.  This feels more fair, and we can both still come out ahead.
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree soon. I'm proposing a 51/49 split - a slight edge to me, but closer to even. Let's seal the deal and avoid losing more to inflation.
